value.title: Google spinoff Cartken and REEF Technologies launch Miami’s first delivery robots
value.excerpt: Self-driving and robotics startup Cartken has partnered with REEF Technologies, a startup that operates parking lots and neighborhood hubs, to bring self-driving delivery robots to the streets of downtown Miami.

value.title: Sophia the robot sells digital NFT artwork for nearly $700,000
